item.title: 2 minute Maggi with Naval
item.description: This is available as a Twitter thread (till the app survives) Making Maggi started taking exactly 2 minutes the day I finished reading the Almanack of Naval Ravikant. — Sankalp Shubham (@dejavucoder) March 25, 2022 Making Maggi started taking exactly 2 minutes the day I finished reading the Almanack of Naval Ravikant. A few days back it took me >= 10 minutes. But I noticed that Manas could make it in 2 minutes.
